name: CUSTOM Bundle builder #5

collection.label: Collection
collection.description: Important: Only add products that don't have variations. Customers can't select specific sizes, colors, or other options when adding these products.

max_products.label: Maximum products in bundle
max_products.description: Sets the maximum number of items customers can add to the bundle.

product_image_border_thickness.label: Border thickness
product_image_border_thickness.description: The border is visible when the product is selected.

mobile_sticky_button.label: Enable sticky button on mobile
mobile_sticky_button.description: The button will scroll to the bundle summary.

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
